lead_paragraph: Fears are high because of a recent spate of traffic deaths, but you are still more likely to be murdered in New York City than be killed by a car while on foot.
snippet: Fears are high because of a recent spate of traffic deaths, but you are still more likely to be murdered in New York City than be killed by a car while on foot....
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column questions safety of walking in New York City in light of spate of fatal traffic accidents; cites data showing that New York is safer place to walk than other big cities in country, but maintains need for policies designed to protect pedestrians; calls for greater enforcement of laws to deter speeding, chief cause of fatal car crashes in New York.

headline.seo: After a Spate of Vehicular Deaths, Is It Safe to Cross the Road?
